sentences: Kui me oma 체histule jalgu alla ei saa, tuleb meil varsti pillid kotti panna.
P채rast kaotust tuli meeskonnal pillid kotti panna ja koju s천ida.
Vihma hakkas sadama, kuid ega talgulised seep채rast veel pille kotti pannud.
context: The phrase 'pillid kotti panna' (literally 'to put instruments in the bag') is an Estonian idiom that means to give up on something, quit an activity, or abandon a task. It's commonly used when someone decides to stop doing something they were previously engaged in, often due to difficulties, obstacles, or changes in circumstances.
